physical_appearance:This is a toran or a doorway hanging. It features a cotton weave with embroidery and mirror work. The piece is decorated with stylized depictions of peacocks
 flowers
 and deities. There are ten small mirror pieces attached to the textile. In the center
 there is a sewn-on inscription. The shape of the toran is irregular
 with a square top and seven dangling panels along the bottom.

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a toran or a doorway hanging. It features a cotton weave with embroidery and mirror work. The piece is decorated with stylized depictions of peacocks, flowers, and deities. There are ten small mirror pieces attached to the textile. In the center, there is a sewn-on inscription. The shape of the toran is irregular, with a square top and seven dangling panels along the bottom.
